mapper.select: SELECT shop_cart_id shopCartId, cart_goods_count cartGoodsCount FROM t_info_shopping_cart WHERE is_delete = 0 AND goods_id = #{goodsId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_info_shopping_cart( shop_cart_id, user_id, goods_id, cart_goods_count, is_delete, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, version )VALUES( #{shopCartId}, #{createUser}, #{goodsId}, #{cartGoodsCount}, 0, NOW(), #{createUser}, NOW(), #{createUser}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT b.goods_id goodsId, b.goods_name goodsName, b.goods_image_path goodsImagePath, b.goods_price goodsPrice, a.cart_goods_count cartGoodsCount, a.shop_cart_id shopCartId FROM t_info_shopping_cart a LEFT JOIN t_info_goods b ON a.goods_id = b.goods_id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 AND a.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_info_shopping_cart SET cart_goods_count = #{cartGoodsCount}, update_time = NOW(), update_user = #{updateUser} WHERE shop_cart_id = #{shopCartId}
